projects.title: Join - mmc
projects.description: Task Manager inspired by the Kanban system. Join allows you to create tasks with categories and assign users. Tasks can then be moved via drag and drop on a clear board.
projects.details: Join was created over 5 weeks in a three-person team as part of the Developer Academy bootcamp. Later I added a simple Django Rest API backend to replace Firebase. These changes allowed Join to be served as a Docker package, so it could be completely self-hosted.

projects.title: El Pollo Loco
projects.description: Jump-and-run game built on object-oriented programming. Help Pepe collect coins and salsa bottles to defeat the wild chicken...
projects.details: The project is completely class-based and uses a 2D canvas to render the objects. It was created during a three-week project work as part of the Developer Akademie.

projects.title: Da Bubble
projects.description: This app is built following the example of Slack. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its own intuitive web interface, real-time message transmission and robust channel organization.
projects.details: Four-week project as part of the Developer Akademie.
